atk-s0402a52:2_0: 161. Dutiyassa paṭhame sukhapaṭikkhepena dukkhā paṭipajjitabbato paṭipadā etissāti
atk-s0402a52:2_1: dukkhāpaṭipadā. Asīghappavattitāya garubhāvena dandhā abhiññā etissāti dandhābhiññā.
atk-s0402a52:4_0: 162. Dutiye abhikkhaṇanti abhiṇhaṁ. Ānantariyanti anantaravipākadāyakaṁ maggasamādhiṁ.
atk-s0402a52:4_1: Āsavānaṁ khayāyāti arahattaphalatthāya. Pañcindriyānīti vipassanāpañcamakāni pañcindriyāni.
atk-s0402a52:4_2: Paññindriyanti hi ettha vipassanāpaññāva paññindriyanti adhippetaṁ. Sesamettha pāḷivasena uttānameva.
atk-s0402a52:5_0: Imāsaṁ pana paṭipadānaṁ ayaṁ āvibhāvakathā – idha bhikkhu pubbe akatābhiniveso pubbabhāge
atk-s0402a52:5_1: rūpapariggahe kilamati, arūpapariggahe kilamati, paccayapariggahe kilamati, tīsu
atk-s0402a52:5_2: addhāsu kilamati, maggāmagge kilamati. Evaṁ pañcasu ṭhānesu kilamanto vipassanaṁ
atk-s0402a52:5_3: pāpuṇāti. Vipassanaṁ patvāpi udayabbayānupassane, bhaṅgānupassane, bhayatupaṭṭhāne,
atk-s0402a52:5_5: gotrabhuñāṇeti imesu navasu vipassanāñāṇesupi kilamitvāva lokuttaramaggaṁ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0402a52:5_6: Tassa so lokuttaramaggo evaṁ dukkhena garubhāvena sacchikatattā dukkhapaṭipado dandhābhiñño
atk-s0402a52:5_7: nāma jāto. Yo pana pubbabhāge pañcasu ñāṇesu kilamanto aparabhāge navasu vipassanāñāṇesu
atk-s0402a52:5_8: akilamitvāva maggaṁ sacchikaroti, tassa so maggo evaṁ dukkhena agarubhāvena sacchikatattā
atk-s0402a52:5_9: dukkhapaṭipado khippābhiñño nāma jāto. Iminā upāyena itarāpi dve veditabbā.
atk-s0402a52:6_0: Goṇapariyesakaupamāhi cetā vibhāvetabbā – ekassa hi purisassa cattāro goṇā palāyitvā
atk-s0402a52:6_1: aṭaviṁ paviṭṭhā. So sakaṇṭake sagahane vane te pariyesanto gahanamaggeneva kicchena
atk-s0402a52:6_2: kasirena gantvā gahanaṭṭhāneyeva nilīne goṇepi kicchena kasirena addasa. Eko kicchena
atk-s0402a52:6_3: gantvā abbhokāse ṭhite khippameva addasa. Aparo abbhokāsamaggena sukhena gantvā gahanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0402a52:6_4: nilīne kicchena kasirena addasa. Aparo abbhokāsamaggeneva sukhena gantvā abbhokāse
atk-s0402a52:6_5: ṭhiteyeva khippaṁ addasa. Tattha cattāro goṇā viya cattāro ariyamaggā daṭṭhabbā,
atk-s0402a52:6_6: goṇapariyesako puriso viya yogāvacaro, gahanamaggena kicchena kasirena gamanaṁ viya
atk-s0402a52:6_7: pubbabhāge pañcasu ñāṇesu kilamato dukkhāpaṭipadā. Gahanaṭṭhāne nilīnānaṁ kiccheneva
atk-s0402a52:6_8: dassanaṁ viya aparabhāge navasu ñāṇesu kilamantassa ariyamaggānaṁ dassanaṁ. Iminā
atk-s0402a52:8_0: 163. Tatiye asubhānupassī kāye viharatīti attano karajakāye ‘‘yathā etaṁ, tathā ida’’nti
atk-s0402a52:8_1: iminā nayena bahiddhā diṭṭhānaṁ dasannaṁ asubhānaṁ upasaṁharaṇavasena asubhānupassī
atk-s0402a52:8_2: viharati, attano kāyaṁ asubhato paṭikūlato ñāṇena passatīti attho. Āhāre paṭikūlasaññīti
atk-s0402a52:8_3: navannaṁ pāṭikulyānaṁ vasena kabaḷīkārāhāre paṭikūlasaññī. Sabbaloke anabhiratisaññīti
atk-s0402a52:8_4: sabbasmimpi tedhātuke lokasannivāse anabhiratāya ukkaṇṭhitasaññāya samannāgato. Sabbasaṅkhāresu
atk-s0402a52:8_5: aniccānupassīti sabbepi tebhūmakasaṅkhāre aniccato anupassanto. Maraṇasaññāti maraṇaṁ
atk-s0402a52:8_6: ārabbha uppannasaññā. Ajjhattaṁ sūpaṭṭhitā hotīti niyakajjhatte suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitā
atk-s0402a52:8_7: hoti. Ettāvatā balavavipassanā kathitā. Sekhabalānīti sikkhanakānaṁ balāni. Sesamettha
atk-s0402a52:8_8: pāḷivasena uttānameva. ‘‘Asubhānupassī’’tiādīni pana dukkhāya paṭipadāya dassanatthaṁ
atk-s0402a52:8_9: vuttāni, paṭhamajjhānādīni sukhāya. Asubhādīni hi paṭikūlārammaṇāni, tesu pana pakatiyāva
atk-s0402a52:8_10: sampiyāyamānaṁ cittaṁ allīyati. Tasmā tāni bhāvento dukkhapaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno nāma
atk-s0402a52:8_11: hoti. Paṭhamajjhānādīni paṇītasukhāni , tasmā tāni paṭipanno sukhapaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a52:9_0: Ayaṁ panettha sabbasādhāraṇā upamā – saṅgāmāvacarapuriso hi phalakakoṭṭhakaṁ katvā
atk-s0402a52:9_1: pañcāvudhāni sannayhitvā saṅgāmaṁ pavisati, so antarā vissamitukāmo phalakakoṭṭhakaṁ
atk-s0402a52:9_2: pavisitvā vissamati ceva pānabhojanādīni ca paṭisevati. Tato puna saṅgāmaṁ pavisitvā
atk-s0402a52:9_3: kammaṁ karoti. Tattha saṅgāmo viya kilesasaṅgāmo daṭṭhabbo, phalakakoṭṭhako viya
atk-s0402a52:9_4: pañcanissayabalāni, saṅgāmapavisanapuriso viya yogāvacaro, pañcāvudhasannāho viya
atk-s0402a52:9_5: vipassanāpañcamāni indriyāni, saṅgāmaṁ pavisanakālo viya vipassanāya kammakaraṇakālo,
atk-s0402a52:9_7: viya vipassanāya kammaṁ karontassa cittuppādassa nirassādakkhaṇe pañca balāni nissāya
atk-s0402a52:9_8: cittaṁ sampahaṁsanakālo, vissamitvā khāditvā pivitvā ca puna saṅgāmassa pavisanakālo
atk-s0402a52:9_9: viya pañcahi balehi cittaṁ sampahaṁsetvā puna vipassanāya kammaṁ karontassa vivaṭṭetvā
atk-s0402a52:9_10: arahattaggahaṇakālo veditabbo. Imasmiṁ pana sutte balāni ceva indriyāni ca missakāneva kathitānīti.
atk-s0402a52:11_0: 164. Catutthe akkhamāti anadhivāsikapaṭipadā. Khamāti adhivāsikapaṭipadā. Damāti
atk-s0402a52:11_1: indriyadamanapaṭipadā. Samāti akusalavitakkānaṁ vūpasamanapaṭipadā. Rosantaṁ paṭirosatīti
atk-s0402a52:11_2: ghaṭṭentaṁ paṭighaṭṭeti. Bhaṇḍantaṁpaṭibhaṇḍatīti paharantaṁ paṭipaharati. Pañcamachaṭṭhāni uttānatthāneva.
atk-s0402a52:13_0: 167. Sattame mahāmoggallānattherassa heṭṭhimā tayo maggā sukhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā
atk-s0402a52:13_1: ahesuṁ, arahattamaggo dukkhapaṭipado khippābhiñño. Tasmā evamāha – ‘‘yāyaṁ paṭipadā
atk-s0402a52:13_2: dukkhā khippābhiññā, imaṁ me paṭipadaṁ āgamma anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimutta’’nti.
atk-s0402a52:15_0: 168. Aṭṭhame dhammasenāpatittherassa heṭṭhimā tayo maggā sukhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā,
atk-s0402a52:15_1: arahattamaggo sukhapaṭipado khippābhiñño. Tasmā ‘‘yāyaṁ paṭipadā sukhā khippābhiññā’’ti
atk-s0402a52:15_2: āha. Imesu pana dvīsupi suttesu missikāva paṭipadā kathitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a52:17_0: 169. Navame paṭhamadutiyapuggalā sukkhavipassakā sasaṅkhārena sappayogena saṅkhāranimittaṁ
atk-s0402a52:17_1: upaṭṭhapenti. Tesu eko vipassanindriyānaṁ balavattā idheva kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyati,
atk-s0402a52:17_2: eko indriyānaṁ dubbalatāya idha asakkonto anantare attabhāve tadeva mūlakammaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0402a52:17_3: paṭilabhitvā sasaṅkhārena sappayogena saṅkhāranimittaṁ upaṭṭhapetvā kilesaparinibbānena
atk-s0402a52:17_4: parinibbāyati, tatiyacatutthā samathayānikā. Tesaṁ eko asaṅkhārena appayogena indriyānaṁ
atk-s0402a52:17_5: balavattā idheva kilese khepeti, eko indriyānaṁ dubbalattā idha asakkonto anantare
atk-s0402a52:17_6: attabhāve tadeva mūlakammaṭṭhānaṁ paṭilabhitvā asaṅkhārena appayogena kilese khepetīti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a52:19_0: 170. Dasame samathapubbaṅgamanti samathaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ purecārikaṁ katvā. Maggo sañjāyatīti
atk-s0402a52:19_1: paṭhamo lokuttaramaggo nibbattati. Sotaṁ magganti ekacittakkhaṇikamaggassa āsevanādīni
atk-s0402a52:19_2: nāma natthi, dutiyamaggādayo pana uppādento tameva āsevati bhāveti bahulīkarotīti
atk-s0402a52:19_3: vuccati. Vipassanāpubbaṅgamanti vipassanaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ purecārikaṁ katvā samathaṁ
atk-s0402a52:19_4: bhāveti, pakatiyā vipassanālābhī vipassanāya ṭhatvā samādhiṁ uppādetīti attho.
atk-s0402a52:20_0: Yuganaddhaṁ bhāvetīti yuganaddhaṁ katvā bhāveti. Tattha teneva cittena samāpattiṁ
atk-s0402a52:20_1: samāpajjitvā teneva saṅkhāre sammasituṁ na sakkā. Ayaṁ pana yāvatā samāpattiyo samāpajjati,
atk-s0402a52:20_2: tāvatā saṅkhāre sammasati. Yāvatā saṅkhāre sammasati, tāvatā samāpattiyo samāpajjati.
atk-s0402a52:20_3: Kathaṁ? Paṭhamajjhānaṁ samāpajjati, tato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasati, saṅkhāre sammasitvā
atk-s0402a52:20_4: dutiyajjhānaṁ samāpajjati. Tato vuṭṭhāya puna saṅkhāre sammasati. Saṅkhāre sammasitvā
atk-s0402a52:20_5: tatiyajjhānaṁ…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṁ samāpajjati, tato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre
atk-s0402a52:20_6: sammasati. Evamayaṁ samathavipassanaṁ yuganaddhaṁ bhāveti nāma.
atk-s0402a52:21_1: uddhaccena viggahitaṁ, suggahitanti attho. So, āvuso, samayoti iminā sattannaṁ sappāyānaṁ
atk-s0402a52:21_2: paṭilābhakālo kathito. Yaṁ taṁ cittanti yasmiṁ samaye taṁ vipassanāvīthiṁ okkamitvā
atk-s0402a52:21_3: pavattaṁ cittaṁ. Ajjhattamevasantiṭṭhatīti vipassanāvīthiṁ paccottharitvā tasmiṁyeva
atk-s0402a52:21_4: gocarajjhattasaṅkhāte ārammaṇe santiṭṭhati. Sannisīdatīti ārammaṇavasena sammā nisīdati.
atk-s0402a52:21_5: Ekodi hotīti ekaggaṁ hoti. Samādhiyatīti sammā ādhiyati suṭṭhapitaṁ hoti. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
